about_the_game:
Welcome to The Other Side! In this challenging precision platformer, you control a ghost who has gotten lost on the way to the afterlife. Explore mysterious caves and dungeons filled with light crystals. When collected, these light crystals will grant you 10 seconds of bright light to help you see your surroundings. Make sure you move quickly to reach the end of the level safely!

FEATURES:

  • Over 100 challenging levels

  • Expert-level bonus stages for those who seek more challenge

  • Completely hand-drawn environments and cutscenes

  • Cute cast of characters who may be trying to kill you

name: The Other Side Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: A platformer about lights! Grab light crystals to brighten your surroundings for 10 seconds as you navigate the challenging courses.
